local_intent: perceive white_plate, perform approach-and-align with up to 2 retries, verify arrival
assumptions: white_plate is within camera view or discoverable by spiral scan
robot can execute ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01 and 1500ms timeout
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'approach' micro-goal from the global tree: ensures perception of the white plate, attempts ApproachAndAlign (with retries), and verifies position with IsAt. Values match global timeouts and tolerances.
